Actions.ActionName: Nov 2023: Added "enabled/disabled" to database, so warn/explain

Actions.Title: Post-upgrade backup completed
Actions.Text: This was a full (no hard links) backup, and no analysis was done. Things will return to normal with the next backup.

Actions.ActionName: If this is the first backupâ€¦
Remove existing alias (which shouldn't be there, but good to test)
Create the new alias via AppleScript
Actions.Text: set apscDone1 to falseset loopCount1 to 0repeat until apscDone1 is true or loopCount1 is 15	try				--if application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" is not running then tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to launch				try			set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"			tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"				set theLocation to getvariable "rg_MBU_BackupLoc"				set theFolderToAlias to getvariable "instance_TheLatestFolderName" instance kmInst			end tell						set myPath to theLocation & "/" & theFolderToAlias						tell application "Finder"				make new alias at POSIX file theLocation to POSIX file myPath				set name of result to "__latest"			end tell		end try				set apscDone1 to true	on error		set apscDone1 to false		set loopCount1 to loopCount1 + 1	end tryend repeat
